api/CG.Blazor.Services.html.title: Namespace CG.Blazor.Services
api/CG.Blazor.Services.html.keywords: Namespace CG.Blazor.Services Classes StateService This class is a default implementation of the IStateService interface. StateServiceExtensions This class contains extension methods related to the IStateService type. TokenProvider This class caches HTTP tokens to make them easily accessable, from Blazor. TokenServiceBase This class is a base implementation of the ITokenService interface. Interfaces IStateService This interface represents an object that holds state. ITokenService This interface represents an object that manages IdentityServer4 access tokens.

api/CG.Blazor.Services.ITokenService.htm.keywords: Interface ITokenService This interface represents an object that manages IdentityServer4 access tokens. index.html.title: Introduction
